name: nametheapp
description: RSS feed reader that fetches and displays news articles from various sources. It includes an RSS Fetcher class that is responsible for fetching the RSS feeds, a server file that serves static files and acts as a proxy to forward requests to the appropriate URLs, and an index file that makes use of the RssFetcher class to fetch and display the news articles. You have encountered a few errors related to CORS and missing headers, and have been working to resolve these issues
author: Errin Johnson
